dialogue.htmlContent:
As you continue to travel through the Foloi Fields, you suddenly spot a squat, wooden signpost sitting by the side of the road up ahead. Approaching this curiosity, you see that the board bears a warning, and you stop to read:

[style.boldOrange(Beware the Headless Horseman!)]
A most foul criminal has once again been reported to be on the prowl! The 'headless horseman' is known to attack innocent citizens and demand that they give him head! Finding him an amusement, Lunette has granted him legal immunity, so all that you can do is try to avoid him!
What is known about this horseman:
- He only attacks at night
- He is only active during the month of October
- He is not interested in money
- He only attacks people whose mouths he can access
Stay safe and don't become his next victim!

Taking this warning seriously, you quickly glance around to make sure that this 'headless horseman' isn't lurking somewhere nearby. Thankfully, there's no sign of this menace, and so after again scanning over the facts about the criminal's modus operandi, you prepare to set off and continue on your way...
[style.italicsMinorGood(You won't encounter the headless horseman again tonight!)]

Although it's mostly wide-open fields which flank either side of the road you find yourself travelling down, now and again you pass by small thickets of densely-packed trees and bushes. At this time of night these tangled copses are absolutely pitch-black, but as you pass by a particularly overgrown patch of foliage, you suddenly spot a floating, yellow light deep within its depths. Just as you catch sight of it, this strange light starts to rapidly move towards you, and you quickly prepare yourself for the worst as it bursts out of the undergrowth and blocks the road ahead.

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_fields_headless_horseman_encountered))

Finally getting a chance to see what exactly this strange light is, you find yourself once again being confronted by some kind of arcane illumination that's glowing out through a creepy face which has been carved into one side of a large pumpkin. Although it looked like it was floating when in the dark copse, you're now able to see that this Jack-o'-Lantern is being worn as a frightening headpiece by a tall figure whose body is otherwise completely concealed by a long, black cloak. Through the eye-slits which have been carved into the pumpkin, you see a pair of red, glowing eyes staring out at you, and before you're able to make a move, this familiar figure calls out in a deep, booming voice, [headHorse.speech(I have chosen you as my victim before! That's right, I am the headless horseman, and once again I demand that you give me head!)]

#ELSE

Finally getting a chance to see what exactly this strange light is, you find your eyes opening wide as you see that it's some kind of arcane illumination that's glowing out through a creepy face which has been carved into one side of a large pumpkin. Although it looked like it was floating when in the dark copse, you're now able to see that this Jack-o'-Lantern is being worn as a frightening headpiece by a tall figure whose body is otherwise completely concealed by a long, black cloak. Through the eye-slits which have been carved into the pumpkin, you see a pair of red, glowing eyes staring out at you, and before you're able to make a move, this figure calls out in a deep, booming voice, [headHorse.speech(This night, you are to become my next victim! That's right, I am the headless horseman, and you shall give me head!)]

#ENDIF

With that, the headless horseman throws open his cloak, revealing to you the fact that he's not wearing any other item of clothing. As he exposes his naked body, you're able to see that this horseman is a greater horse-boy, and the horse-like hair covering his muscular body is completely pitch-black. Surrender to me and let me fuck your face, or else I'll have to use force to get my way!)]
